attributes.background: To admit like they did with gyms that outdoor sports offer such a low risk to C19 but offer a far greater mental and healthy approach to keeping C19 at bay

rejection.details:
Under the local tier restrictions which came into force on December 2nd, organised outdoor sport, physical activity and exercise classes can continue, though higher-risk contact activity should be avoided in tier 3 areas. See:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know
